verses.verse: Ephraim <S%H669><s%> feeds <S%H7462><s%> on wind, <S%H7307><s%> And pursues <S%H7291><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H6921><s%> continually <S%H3605><s%>; <S%H3117><s%> He multiplies <S%H7235><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> and violence. <S%H7701><s%> Moreover, he makes <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Assyria, <S%H804><s%> And oil <S%H8081><s%> is carried <S%H2986><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> also has a dispute <S%H7379><s%> with Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And will punish <S%H6485><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> according to his ways; <S%H1870><s%> He will repay <S%H7725><s%> him according to his deeds. <S%H4611><s%>
In the womb <S%H990><s%> he took <S%H6117><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> by the heel, <S%H6117><s%> And in his maturity <S%H202><s%> he contended <S%H8280><s%> with God. <S%H430><s%>

Yes, he wrestled <S%H8280><s%> with the angel <S%H4397><s%> and prevailed; <S%H3201><s%> He wept <S%H1058><s%> and sought <S%H2603><s%> His favor. <S%H2603><s%> He found <S%H4672><s%> Him at Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> And there <S%H8033><s%> He spoke <S%H1696><s%> with us,
Even the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is His name. <S%H2143><s%>

Therefore, return <S%H7725><s%> to your God, <S%H430><s%> Observe <S%H8104><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> and justice, <S%H4941><s%> And wait <S%H6960><s%> for your God <S%H430><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>
A merchant, <S%H9212><s%> in whose hands <S%H3027><s%> are false <S%H4820><s%> balances, <S%H3976><s%> He loves <S%H157><s%> to oppress. <S%H6231><s%>

And Ephraim <S%H669><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely <S%H389><s%> I have become <S%H6238><s%> rich, <S%H6238><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> wealth <S%H202><s%> for myself; In all <S%H3605><s%> my labors <S%H3018><s%> they will find <S%H4672><s%> in me No <S%H3808><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [would be] sin. <S%H2399><s%>"

But I [have been] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> I will make you live <S%H3427><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> As in the days <S%H3117><s%> of the appointed <S%H4150><s%> festival. <S%H4150><s%>

I have also spoken <S%H1696><s%> to the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> And I gave <S%H7235><s%> numerous <S%H7235><s%> visions; <S%H2377><s%> And through <S%H3027><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> I gave <S%H1819><s%> parables. <S%H1819><s%>

Is there iniquity <S%H205><s%> [in] Gilead <S%H1568><s%>? Surely <S%H389><s%> they are worthless. <S%H7723><s%> In Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> they sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> bulls, <S%H7794><s%> Yes, <S%H1571><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%> are like the stone <S%H1530><s%> heaps <S%H1530><s%> Beside <S%H5921><s%> the furrows <S%H8525><s%> of the field. <S%H9583><s%>

Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> to the land <S%H7704><s%> of Aram, <S%H758><s%> And Israel <S%H3478><s%> worked <S%H5647><s%> for a wife, <S%H802><s%> And for a wife <S%H802><s%> he kept <S%H8104><s%> [sheep.]
But by a prophet <S%H5030><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And by a prophet <S%H5030><s%> he was kept. <S%H8104><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> has provoked <S%H3707><s%> to bitter <S%H8563><s%> anger; <S%H3707><s%> So his Lord <S%H136><s%> will leave <S%H5203><s%> his bloodguilt <S%H1818><s%> on him, And bring <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> his reproach <S%H2781><s%> to him.
